extensionDescription.message: This extension enables time travel. Right click on the page or on links to travel through time.
Travel to the past of the web by right-clicking pages and links.

popupDateText.description: Label for the date input field

popupTimeText.description: Label for the time input field

popupDescriptionText.message: Select a date for time travel (in GMT). Right click on the page or on links to travel through time.
popupDescriptionText.description: Small description text for extension usage

popupSetDatetime.description: Label for the set datetime button

popupCancelDatetime.description: Label for the cancel datetime button

menuInitDatetimeTitle.message: Select a date for time travel...
menuInitDatetimeTitle.description: Title text for the last memento menu option.

menuGetNearDatetimeTitle.description: Title text to get the resource near the set datetime in menu

menuGetNearCurrentTitle.description: Title text for the last memento menu option.

menuGotUnknownDateTitle.message: Got unknown date: Memento-Datetime not provided
menuGotUnknownDateTitle.description: Title text for to display non-native memento datetime.

menuGetCurrentTitle.description: Title text to get the original resource in the menu.

menuGotCurrentTitle.description: Title text to display that the received resource is an original.

menuGotMementoDatetimeTitle.description: Title text to display the received memento-datetime

optionsTitle.description: The title for the options pane.

optionsArchiveDescription.message:
In many cases, web pages do not provide information about the web archive that should be used to gain access to their history. The Memento extension allows selecting a default web archive to use in those cases:

* Memento Aggregator: When selecting this option, page history available in several web archives is taken into account. This option improves the chances to retrieve an archived page that is close to the selected time travel date. It is the recommended option.
* Specific Archive: When selecting this option, only page history available in the chosen archive is taken into account.
optionsArchiveDescription.description: This is the text that explains the individual archive choices

optionsCurrentlyUsedArchiveTitle.description: Title that mentions the currently chosen web archive

optionsCurrentlyUsedArchiveUrl.description: The text that displays the archive name and it's base uri

optionsSelectArchiveTitle.message: Select the web archive you would like to include:
optionsSelectArchiveTitle.description: Title that mentions the text to choose a web archive

optionsUpdateButtonText.description: The text for the update archive selection button
